title: Tahere Tikitiki: the making of a Maori canoe
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit and David H. Fowler
brief_description: Follows the building of a Maori canoe, picturing the lives of the men who make the canoe while relating the symbolic elements of Maori culture which enter into the activity.
